metadata.title: CVE-2021-40145 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** gdImageGd2Ptr in gd_gd2.c in the GD Graphics Library (akaLibGD) through 2.3.2 has a double free. NOTE: the vendor's position is "TheGD2 image format is a proprietary image format of libgd. It has to beregarded as being obsolete, and should only be used for development andtesting purposes."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-40145` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.12+esm1
libgd3 - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.12+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.12+esm1').
